content: and forth keeping in stockinette st you will have 75 80 90 98 stitches on the front and 75 80 90 98 stitches on the back of your piece step 4 working the front of your piece put 75 80 90 98 back sts on a holder the remaining front 75 80 90 98 sts are on your working needle turn so that ws is facing you and start working stockinette stitch flat row 1 ws p row 2 rs slip 1st stitch knitwise k1 ssk 2x k to last 6 sts k2tog 2x k2 71 76 86 94 stitches remain row 3 ws slip 1st purlwise p to end row 4 rs slip 1st stitch knitwise k1 ssk k to last 4 sts k2tog k2 69 74 84 92 sts remain row 5 ws slip 1st purlwise p to end repeat these last 2 row until you have 57 60 68 74 sts left continue in stockinette st making sure you slip the first st knitwise on the rs and purl wise on the ws until your piece measures 5 5 5 5 6 6 from armhole bind off make sure to end with a ws row note should you want to add more length to the armhole now is the time to do so just remember that your piece will grow after you wash it also keep in mind that adding length will affect your use of yardage you just ended with a ws row and the rs is now facing you you are now ready to bind off for front neckline copyright 2018 nancy ricci all rights reserved this pattern may not be reproduced or used for resale without the written permission of the copyright holder page 5� of 6� step 5 binding off for front neckline and knitting the shoulder straps last row rs k10 10 12 14 b o 37 40 44 46 k remaining 9 9 11 13 sts note as you are finished with binding off 37 40 44 46 stitches you will see that 1 stitch sits on your right hand needle and 9 9 11 13 stitches remain on your left hand needle so go ahead and knit those 9 9 11 13 sts together they will form the 10 10 12 14 strap stitches as of now you have 10 10 12 14 stitches on either side of your needle for both shoulder straps continue to knit on your left shoulder strap in stockinette st for 4 row and leave those sts on a holder cut yarn leaving a 20 tail attach yarn for right shoulder strap and starting with a ws row knit in stockinette st for 4 row and leave sts on a holder step 6 working the back of your piece transfer 75 80 90 98 back sts from your holder onto your working needles with ws facing you re-attach ball of yarn and start working back exactly the same as for front see step 4 starting
